initial_data_analysis module¶

initial data analysis on the meshes. Does not contain any useful methods for the project, except the ability to view point clouds in a tensorboard session.

initial_data_analysis.mesh_tf_demo()[source]¶

demo script on how to use tensorboard to visualise point clouds.

Returns

Return type

initial_data_analysis.show_3d_slicing()[source]¶

simple demo on viewing 3d slices

Returns

Return type

initial_data_analysis.tf_make_tb_mesh(data_loc='./data/Andrew_Richie_pelvis_shape')[source]¶

reads all stl files in a folder and concatantes them into a point cloud that is then saved as a tensorboard object

Parameters

data_loc (string) -- location of the .stl files

Returns

Return type

initial_data_analysis.tf_make_tb_mesh_left_right(data_loc='./data/Andrew_Richie_pelvis_shape', show_faces=True)[source]¶

reads the study folders containng the right and left pelvis and stores them as a tensorboard mesh obejct

Parameters

data_loc -- location of the right and left stl files: should contain folders with names Right and Left

contaning one stl file for the right and left pelvis respectively :type data_loc: string :return: :rtype:
